leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-序列分析与注释生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 采集/解析→QC→比对/组装→注释→评测→工作流

unit.unit_name: 组装与纠错（短读/长读/混合）

queries: [WEB] long read de novo assembly tools github
[WEB] short read error correction tools github

tools.name: PHFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-fragment assembly tool using proxy-level hybrid transformer
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of PHFormer, a deep learning-based approach for multi-fragment assembly tasks, utilizing a proxy-level hybrid transformer architecture.

tools.name: ICRA_ASP
tools.one_line_profile: Robotic assembly sequence planning with Graph Transformer
tools.detailed_description: A planning tool for robotic assembly sequences utilizing Graph Transformers, designed for manufacturing and robotics research contexts.

tools.name: SpadeR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for biodiversity index computation and community analysis
tools.detailed_description: Provides functions to compute various biodiversity indices and related (dis)similarity measures based on individual-based (abundance) or sampling-unit-based (incidence) data.

tools.name: Bin Chicken
tools.one_line_profile: Recovery of low abundance MAGs through strategic coassembly
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the recovery of low abundance and taxonomically targeted metagenome assembled genomes (MAGs) using strategic coassembly methods.

tools.name: INNUca
tools.one_line_profile: QC and de novo assembly workflow for bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for quality control of reads, de novo assembly, and contig quality assessment, including contamination search, developed for the INNUENDO project.

tools.name: Hercules
tools.one_line_profile: Profile HMM-based hybrid error correction for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid error correction algorithm for long reads (e.g., Nanopore/PacBio) that utilizes Profile HMMs to improve sequence accuracy.

tools.name: proovread
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio hybrid error correction through iterative short read consensus
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid correction pipeline for PacBio reads that uses short reads (Illumina) to iteratively correct errors through consensus.

tools.name: LR_Gapcloser
tools.one_line_profile: Gap closing tool for assemblies using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses long sequenced reads to close gaps in genome assemblies, improving contiguity.

tools.name: IRMA
tools.one_line_profile: Iterative Refinement Meta-Assembler for viruses
tools.detailed_description: A highly configurable and adaptive tool designed for the robust assembly of viral genomes, particularly useful for complex or variable viral populations.

tools.name: nf-virontus
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore viral assembly and classification workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for Oxford Nanopore data processing, including reference mapping, taxonomic classification, and de novo assembly, tailored for viral sequences.

tools.name: Apollo
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly polishing algorithm for error correction
tools.detailed_description: An assembly polishing algorithm that attempts to correct errors in genome assemblies using multiple sets of reads, applicable to genomes of any size.

tools.name: Rawasm
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly from raw nanopore signals
tools.detailed_description: A patch for miniasm that enables the construction of genome assemblies directly from raw nanopore electrical signals.

tools.name: PathSeq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for discovery of microbial sequences in metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: A computational tool to enable the discovery and identification of microbial sequences in metagenomic samples, including tools for viral integration site identification.

tools.name: GRACE
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Assembly processing networks for robotic assembly
tools.detailed_description: A framework using Graph Assembly processing networks for robotic assembly sequence planning and feasibility learning.

tools.name: Ratatosk
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid error correction of long reads using colored de Bruijn graphs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for hybrid error correction of long sequencing reads by utilizing colored de Bruijn graphs to improve accuracy.

tools.name: viralFlye
tools.one_line_profile: Viral assembly pipeline based on Flye
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for viral genome assembly, leveraging the Flye assembler architecture.

tools.name: RAMPART
tools.one_line_profile: Configurable de novo assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A configurable pipeline for de novo genome assembly, designed to streamline the assembly process.

tools.name: indel_correction_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for correcting heterozygote indel errors in assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to correct heterozygote indel errors in Falcon assemblies that remain after Quiver and Pilon polishing.

tools.name: aurora-unicycler
tools.one_line_profile: Battery cycling protocol converter
tools.detailed_description: A tool to define battery cycling protocols and convert them to various formats (Neware, Biologic, PyBaMM) for materials science research.

tools.name: FastMLST
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-core tool for multilocus sequence typing
tools.detailed_description: A fast, multi-core tool for performing multilocus sequence typing (MLST) on draft genome assemblies.

tools.name: WeFaceNano
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore plasmid assembly and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Nanopore data that handles FAST5 basecalling, assembly, plasmid identification, and antimicrobial resistance gene detection.

tools.name: Minia
tools.one_line_profile: Short-read assembler based on a de Bruijn graph
tools.detailed_description: A short-read assembler that utilizes a de Bruijn graph structure, optimized for low memory usage.

tools.name: assembler-components
tools.one_line_profile: Components for building genome assembly tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of software components and libraries designed to assist in the development of genome sequence assembly tools, adhering to GFA specifications.

tools.name: metaMDBG
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight assembler for long metagenomics reads
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight assembler designed for long and accurate metagenomics reads, utilizing de Bruijn graphs.

tools.name: nanoflow
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for de novo assembly of nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based workflow for the de novo assembly of Oxford Nanopore sequencing reads.

tools.name: hybrid-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for hybrid assembly using short and long reads
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Nextflow that combines short and long sequencing reads to perform hybrid genome assembly.

tools.name: hapcorrect
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype phase-switching error correction tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to correct haplotype phase-switching errors in long-read sequencing data, improving the quality of phased assemblies.

tools.name: Simple-Circularise
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to circularise linear sequences overlapped during assembly
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility to circularise linear sequences that represent circular genomes (e.g., plasmids, mitochondria) but were output as linear contigs with overlaps by the assembler.

tools.name: MeGAMerge
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to merge assembled contigs and long reads from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Perl-based tool developed by LANL for merging assembled contigs and long reads from metagenomic sequencing runs to improve assembly continuity.

tools.name: ont-assembly-snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for bacterial genome assembly and polishing using ONT reads
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed for the assembly and polishing of bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data.

tools.name: score-assemblies
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for scoring and comparing bacterial genome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow to score and compare multiple bacterial genome assemblies (Illumina, Nanopore) against reference genomes, facilitating quality assessment.

tools.name: colora
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for de novo genome assembly and phasing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for de novo genome assembly that produces chromosome-scale primary and phased assemblies, including organelle genomes, and performs automatic quality assessment.

tools.name: DeChat
tools.one_line_profile: Repeat and haplotype aware error correction for nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for correcting errors in nanopore sequencing reads, specifically designed to handle repeats and haplotypes to improve data quality.

tools.name: CAT_pack
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for taxonomic classification of contigs and MAGs
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools (CAT, BAT, RAT) for the taxonomic classification of contigs and metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), as well as taxonomic profiling of metagenomes.

tools.name: Jaeger
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for detecting phages in sequence assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A quick and precise tool designed to detect bacteriophage sequences within genomic assemblies, aiding in viral identification.

tools.name: multi-metagenome
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts and workflow for assembling microbial genomes from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tutorials that function as a workflow for the differential binning and assembly of individual microbial genomes from metagenomic data.

tools.name: Inspector
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for evaluating long-read de novo assembly results
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to evaluate the quality of de novo genome assemblies generated from long-read sequencing data, identifying structural and base-level errors.

tools.name: MiRCA
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid error correction tool for NGS long reads
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid error correction tool that utilizes short reads to correct errors in Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) long reads.

tools.name: NovoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for building whole genome graphs from long-read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed to construct whole genome graphs using de novo assemblies derived from long-read sequencing data, aiding in pangenome analysis.

tools.name: de-novo-transcriptome-assembly-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Combined de novo transcriptome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline script for running multiple de novo transcriptome assemblers with various parameters to optimize assembly quality.

tools.name: IMSindel
tools.one_line_profile: Intermediate-size indel detection tool using de novo assembly
tools.detailed_description: An accurate tool for detecting intermediate-size insertions and deletions (indels) by incorporating de novo assembly and split read analysis.

tools.name: HECIL
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid error correction of long reads using iterative learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool for hybrid error correction of long sequencing reads that employs an iterative learning approach to improve accuracy.

tools.name: temperate-phage-active-prophage-detection
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to detect temperate phages in bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for detecting temperate phages (active prophages) within assembled bacterial genome sequences.

tools.name: NextDenovo
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate de novo assembler for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A string graph-based de novo assembler designed for long reads (PacBio/ONT), known for its speed and accuracy in assembling large genomes.

tools.name: NextPolish
tools.one_line_profile: Genome polishing tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool to fix base errors (SNV/Indel) in genomes generated by noisy long reads, utilizing both short and long reads for polishing.

tools.name: NextPolish2
tools.one_line_profile: Repeat-aware polishing for HiFi long read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: The successor to NextPolish, specifically optimized for repeat-aware polishing of genomes assembled using PacBio HiFi long reads.

tools.name: Mapler
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly and evaluation pipeline for HiFi reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for metagenome assembly and evaluation, with a focus on PacBio HiFi long reads, supporting hybrid assembly approaches.

tools.name: nanite
tools.one_line_profile: Oxford Nanopore Viral Metagenomics Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined pipeline for processing Oxford Nanopore viral metagenomics data, handling assembly and analysis.

tools.name: ELBA
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel string graph construction for de novo assembly
tools.detailed_description: A tool for parallel string graph construction, transitive reduction, and contig generation, aimed at efficient de novo genome assembly.

tools.name: pb-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: PacBio Assembly Tool Suite
tools.detailed_description: The official suite of assembly tools from Pacific Biosciences, including Falcon and other utilities for assembling PacBio long reads.

tools.name: TransPi
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive transcriptome analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline for de novo transcriptome assembly and analysis, automating multiple steps from quality control to annotation.

tools.name: LandR
tools.one_line_profile: Landscape Ecosystem Modelling in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for simulation and modelling of landscape ecosystems, often used in conjunction with the SpaDES framework.

tools.name: NetLogoR
tools.one_line_profile: R implementation of NetLogo functions for agent-based modelling
tools.detailed_description: A translation of NetLogo functions and framework into R, enabling agent-based modelling and discrete event simulation within the R environment.

tools.name: SpaDES
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial Discrete Event Simulation framework for R
tools.detailed_description: A robust R framework for developing and running spatial discrete event simulation models, widely used in ecological modeling.

tools.name: MUFFIN
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly and differential binning workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow for metagenomics and transcriptomics that performs hybrid assembly and differential binning.

tools.name: Hairsplitter
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to separate collapsed sequences in assemblies using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A software tool designed to separate very similar sequences (e.g., haplotypes or strain variants) that have been collapsed into a single contig during genome assembly, utilizing long reads.

tools.name: PhasedDiploidGenomeAssemblyPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for reference-free diploid genome assembly using de-novo assembly and read-phasing
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to assemble diploid genomes without a reference by combining de-novo assembly techniques with read-phasing strategies to separate haplotypes.

tools.name: reticulatus
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for assembling and polishing genomes from Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based automated workflow for assembling long-read Nanopore data and performing subsequent polishing steps to produce high-quality genome assemblies.

tools.name: mmlong2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for recovery and analysis of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs)
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to facilitate the recovery, refinement, and analysis of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) from complex metagenomic datasets.

tools.name: culebrONT
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for assembly, polishing, and QC of Oxford Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake pipeline that orchestrates the assembly, circularization, polishing, correction, and quality control processes for Oxford Nanopore sequencing data.

tools.name: Shotgun-Metagenomics-Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for analysis of metagenomic shotgun sequences including assembly and speciation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and workflows for processing shotgun metagenomics data, covering steps from assembly to speciation and antibiotic resistance gene discovery.

tools.name: LazyB
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for economic genome assembly from low coverage Illumina and Nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A genome assembly tool designed to work efficiently with low-coverage hybrid datasets (Illumina and Nanopore), optimizing for cost-effective genomic reconstruction.

tools.name: HMSSS
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identification of sulfur metabolism-related genes in genome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: HMS-S-S identifies sulfur metabolism-related genes and analyzes operon structures within genome and metagenome assemblies.

tools.name: BigDEC
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable Big Data tool for short-read error correction
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based tool leveraging Big Data technologies for scalable error correction of short sequencing reads.

tools.name: Donut_Falls
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for assembly of Nanopore sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline developed by UPHL-BioNGS for the assembly and processing of Nanopore sequencing reads.

tools.name: TIPP
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for telomere local assembly, genome polishing, and plastid assembly
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit focused on specific assembly tasks including telomere local assembly, improved whole-genome polishing, and plastid genome assembly.

tools.name: Jaeger
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for detecting phages in sequence assemblies
tools.detailed_description: Jaeger is designed to quickly and precisely identify bacteriophage sequences within larger genome assemblies.

tools.name: skandiver
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identifying mobile genetic elements from assembled genomes using ANI
tools.detailed_description: A program that identifies mobile genetic elements such as prophages, plasmids, and transposases in assembled whole genome sequences using average nucleotide identity (ANI).

tools.name: BiB_ADV-SCI--DL_for_Peptide
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library and dataset for peptide self-assembly analysis
tools.detailed_description: Provides a dataset and deep learning methods (graph and sequence-based) for analyzing and predicting peptide self-assembly properties.

tools.name: dentist
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to close assembly gaps using long-reads at high accuracy
tools.detailed_description: Dentist uses long-read sequencing data to accurately close gaps in genome assemblies, improving contiguity and completeness.

tools.name: graphamr
tools.one_line_profile: Antibiotic resistance prediction from metagenome assembly graphs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting antibiotic resistance genes directly from metagenome assembly graphs, enabling analysis of complex metagenomic data.

tools.name: metaGT
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenome and metatranscriptome joint assembly
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the joint assembly of metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data to improve assembly quality and functional annotation.

tools.name: rnaquast
tools.one_line_profile: Quality assessment tool for de novo transcriptome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A quality assessment tool specifically designed for evaluating de novo transcriptome assemblies from RNA-Seq data.

tools.name: SPAdes
tools.one_line_profile: Versatile genome assembler for single-cell and standard data
tools.detailed_description: SPAdes (St. Petersburg genome assembler) is an assembly toolkit containing various assembly pipelines for different data types, including single-cell, metagenomes, and plasmids.

tools.name: wengan
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate and ultra-fast hybrid genome assembler
tools.detailed_description: Wengan is a hybrid genome assembler that combines long reads (Oxford Nanopore or PacBio) with short reads (Illumina) to produce high-quality assemblies efficiently.

tools.name: 3d-dna
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for 3D de novo assembly using Hi-C data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for scaffolding de novo genome assemblies using Hi-C (chromosome conformation capture) data to produce chromosome-length scaffolds.

tools.name: Bact-Builder
tools.one_line_profile: Microbial de novo genome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the automated de novo assembly of microbial genomes, streamlining the process from raw reads to assembled contigs.

tools.name: virsearch
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow to detect and classify viruses in metagenome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to identify and classify viral sequences within metagenomic assembly datasets.

tools.name: JASPER
tools.one_line_profile: Jellyfish based Assembly Sequence Polisher for Error Reduction
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses k-mer frequencies (via Jellyfish) to polish genome assemblies and reduce sequencing errors.

tools.name: karect
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate correction of substitution, insertion and deletion errors in NGS reads
tools.detailed_description: Karect is a tool for error correction of next-generation sequencing data, handling substitutions, insertions, and deletions to improve downstream assembly quality.

tools.name: magpurify2
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to identify and remove contaminants from metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: MAGpurify2 is designed to improve the quality of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) by detecting and removing contamination based on various genomic features.

tools.name: SOAPdenovo2
tools.one_line_profile: Short-read de novo genome assembler for large genomes
tools.detailed_description: An improved version of SOAPdenovo, designed for the de novo assembly of large plant and animal genomes from short-read sequencing data.

tools.name: T2T-Polish
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation and polishing workflows for Telomere-to-Telomere genome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A collection of workflows used for polishing and evaluating high-quality, complete (T2T) genome assemblies.

tools.name: Chloroplast-genome-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling chloroplast genomes using short or long reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline specifically tailored for the assembly of chloroplast genomes, supporting both short-read and long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: Organelle_PBA
tools.one_line_profile: Assembler for chloroplast and mitochondrial genomes using PacBio data
tools.detailed_description: A software pipeline designed to assemble organelle genomes (chloroplast and mitochondria) specifically from PacBio long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: GRAbB
tools.one_line_profile: Genome Region Assembly by Baiting for targeted assembly
tools.detailed_description: GRAbB (Genome Region Assembly by Baiting) is a program designed to assemble selected regions of the genome or transcriptome using reference sequences and NGS data.

tools.name: sparrowhawk
tools.one_line_profile: Short-read assembler for bacterial genomics based on de Bruijn graph
tools.detailed_description: A short-read assembler specifically designed for bacterial genomics, implementing a de Bruijn graph approach in Rust.

tools.name: wf-paired-end-illumina-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for genome assembly of Illumina paired-end sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A pathogen-agnostic general workflow for the assembly of Illumina paired-end sequence data, maintained by the Bacterial Genomics group.

tools.name: JTK
tools.one_line_profile: Regional diploid genome assembler
tools.detailed_description: JTK is a regional diploid genome assembler written in Rust, designed to handle specific genomic regions.

tools.name: AlignGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Secondary de novo genome assembly guided by closely related references
tools.detailed_description: AlignGraph is an algorithm for secondary de novo genome assembly that uses closely related reference genomes to guide the assembly process and improve contiguity.

tools.name: BRANCH
tools.one_line_profile: Boosting RNA-Seq assemblies with partial or related genomic sequences
tools.detailed_description: BRANCH is a tool designed to improve RNA-Seq assemblies by utilizing partial or related genomic sequences as guidance.

tools.name: RAILS
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly improvement by long sequence scaffolding and gap-filling
tools.detailed_description: RAILS and Cobbler are tools for scaffolding and gap-filling genome assemblies using long DNA sequences.

tools.name: SSAKE
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic assembler for short sequence reads
tools.detailed_description: SSAKE is a genomics application for assembling millions of very short DNA sequences, one of the earliest short-read assemblers.

tools.name: TASR
tools.one_line_profile: Targeted Assembly of Short Reads
tools.detailed_description: TASR (Targeted Assembly of Short Reads) is a tool for targeted assembly of specific genomic regions from short read data.

tools.name: ABySS
tools.one_line_profile: De novo genome assembler for short reads
tools.detailed_description: ABySS is a de novo sequence assembler intended for short paired-end reads and large genomes.

tools.name: ARCS
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold genome sequence assemblies using linked or long read data
tools.detailed_description: ARCS is a tool for scaffolding genome sequence assemblies using linked reads (e.g., 10x Genomics) or long reads.

tools.name: GoldPolish
tools.one_line_profile: Long read sequence polisher
tools.detailed_description: GoldPolish (aka GoldRush-Edit) is a long read sequence polisher used within the GoldRush assembler pipeline.

tools.name: GoldRush
tools.one_line_profile: Linear-time de novo long read assembler
tools.detailed_description: GoldRush is a linear-time de novo assembler designed for long read sequencing data.

tools.name: Kollector
tools.one_line_profile: De novo targeted gene assembly
tools.detailed_description: Kollector is a tool for the de novo assembly of targeted genes or genomic regions.

tools.name: mtGrasp
tools.one_line_profile: De novo reference-grade mitochondrial genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: mtGrasp is a tool for de novo reference-grade mitochondrial genome assembly and standardization.

tools.name: ntEdit
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly polishing and SNV detection
tools.detailed_description: ntEdit is a scalable genome assembly polishing tool that uses Bloom filters to correct errors and detect SNVs.

tools.name: Trans-ABySS
tools.one_line_profile: De novo assembly of RNA-seq data using ABySS
tools.detailed_description: Trans-ABySS is a software pipeline for de novo assembly of RNA-seq data, utilizing the ABySS assembler.

tools.name: metagenome_assembly
tools.one_line_profile: WDL Workflow for metagenome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A WDL-based workflow for performing metagenome assembly, likely developed for institutional use.

tools.name: w2rap-contigger
tools.one_line_profile: Illumina PE genome contig assembler for large complex genomes
tools.detailed_description: An Illumina paired-end genome contig assembler capable of handling large (e.g., 17Gbp) and complex (e.g., hexaploid) genomes.

tools.name: LSC
tools.one_line_profile: Long read error correction tool
tools.detailed_description: LSC is a tool designed for the error correction of long reads (e.g., PacBio) using short reads to improve accuracy.

tools.name: Jabba
tools.one_line_profile: Read error correction tool for PacBio data
tools.detailed_description: Jabba is a tool specifically designed for correcting errors in PacBio long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: FEHAT
tools.one_line_profile: Software to detect heart rate from medaka embryos
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for analyzing video or image data to detect and calculate the heart rate of medaka fish embryos.

tools.name: assemblotron
tools.one_line_profile: Automated optimisation of de-novo transcriptome assembly
tools.detailed_description: Assemblotron is a tool for automating the optimization of parameters for de novo transcriptome assembly to improve quality.

tools.name: myloasm
tools.one_line_profile: High-resolution long-read metagenome assembler
tools.detailed_description: Myloasm is a de novo assembler designed for high-resolution assembly of metagenomes from long-read data, capable of handling noisy reads.

tools.name: KIPEs
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-based Identification of Pathway Enzymes
tools.detailed_description: KIPEs performs automatic annotation of flavonoid biosynthesis steps in transcriptome or genome assemblies.

tools.name: MGSE
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping-based Genome Size Estimation
tools.detailed_description: MGSE estimates genome size based on read mapping to an existing genome assembly.

tools.name: Pilon
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly improvement and variant detection tool
tools.detailed_description: Pilon is a software tool for automatically improving genome assemblies and detecting variants (SNPs and indels) using read alignments.

tools.name: viral-ngs
tools.one_line_profile: Viral genomics analysis pipelines
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pipelines for viral genomics analysis, including assembly, phylogenetics, and classification (Note: Deprecated in favor of newer modular repos but historically significant).

tools.name: OATK
tools.one_line_profile: Organelle de novo genome assembly toolkit
tools.detailed_description: OATK is a toolkit designed for the de novo assembly of organelle genomes (mitochondria and plastids).

tools.name: BRASS
tools.one_line_profile: Breakpoints via assembly for rearrangement detection
tools.detailed_description: BRASS (Breakpoints via assembly) identifies breakpoints and attempts to assemble rearrangements in whole genome sequencing data.

tools.name: bin3C
tools.one_line_profile: Extract metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) using Hi-C
tools.detailed_description: bin3C is a tool for extracting metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) from metagenomic data by leveraging Hi-C contact information.

tools.name: Shasta
tools.one_line_profile: De novo assembly from Oxford Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: Shasta is a de novo genome assembler specifically designed for Oxford Nanopore long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: Hifiasm
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype-resolved assembler for accurate Hifi reads
tools.detailed_description: Hifiasm is a fast haplotype-resolved de novo assembler for PacBio HiFi reads. It can produce haplotype-resolved assemblies from HiFi reads alone or with Hi-C/trio data.

tools.name: EukMetaSanity
tools.one_line_profile: Structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: EukMetaSanity is a pipeline designed for the structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic genomes recovered from metagenomic datasets (MAGs).

tools.name: LODA
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for mining integer sequence programs
tools.detailed_description: LODA is an assembly language, a computational model, and a tool for mining programs that generate integer sequences, often used in experimental mathematics.

tools.name: dnaPipeTE
tools.one_line_profile: De-novo assembly & annotation pipeline for Transposable Elements
tools.detailed_description: dnaPipeTE is a pipeline designed to find, annotate, and quantify Transposable Elements in small samples of NGS datasets without requiring genome assembly.

tools.name: RATTLE
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free reconstruction and error correction of transcriptomes from Nanopore
tools.detailed_description: RATTLE performs reference-free reconstruction and error correction of transcriptomes using Nanopore long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: Tablet
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical viewer for NGS assemblies and alignments
tools.detailed_description: Tablet is a lightweight, high-performance graphical viewer for next generation sequence assemblies and alignments.

tools.name: Spade UI
tools.one_line_profile: User interface for SPADE flow cytometry analysis
tools.detailed_description: The user interface component for SPADE (Spanning-tree Progression Analysis of Density-normalized Events), a visualization and analysis tool for high-dimensional flow cytometry data.

tools.name: Peregrine
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Genome Assembler Using SHIMMER Index
tools.detailed_description: Peregrine is a fast genome assembler that uses SHIMMER indices for assembling long reads.

tools.name: RegCloser
tools.one_line_profile: Genome gap-closing tool based on robust regression
tools.detailed_description: RegCloser is a tool for closing gaps in genome assemblies using a robust regression approach, applicable to NGS and TGS data.

tools.name: MetaSBT
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for indexing microbial genomes and characterizing MAGs
tools.detailed_description: MetaSBT is a scalable framework for automatically indexing microbial genomes and accurately characterizing metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) with Sequence Bloom Trees.

tools.name: NanoForms
tools.one_line_profile: Server for processing, analysis and assembly of Nanopore sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: NanoForms is an integrated server for processing, analysis, and assembly of raw sequencing data of microbial genomes from Oxford Nanopore technology.

tools.name: denovopipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for de novo peptide sequencing and assembly
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for de novo peptide sequencing (using Novor, DeepNovo, etc.) and assembly with ALPS.

tools.name: DETONATE
tools.one_line_profile: De novo Transcriptome RNA-seq Assembly evaluation tool
tools.detailed_description: DETONATE (DE novo TranscriptOme rNa-seq Assembly with or without the Truth Evaluation) is a software package for evaluating de novo transcriptome assemblies.

tools.name: RefineM
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for improving metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: RefineM is a toolbox for improving the quality of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) by identifying and removing contamination.

tools.name: PacBio-utilities
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for working with PacBio-based assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utilities for working with PacBio-based genome assemblies, including tools for processing and analyzing long-read data.

tools.name: HiCBin
tools.one_line_profile: Binning metagenomic contigs using Hi-C contact maps
tools.detailed_description: HiCBin is a tool for binning metagenomic contigs and recovering metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) using Hi-C contact maps.

tools.name: Oases
tools.one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembler for short reads
tools.detailed_description: Oases is a de novo transcriptome assembler designed to produce transcripts from short read sequencing technologies.

tools.name: Velvet
tools.one_line_profile: Short read de novo assembler using de Bruijn graphs
tools.detailed_description: Velvet is a de novo genomic assembler specially designed for short read sequencing technologies, using de Bruijn graphs.

tools.name: Jitterbug
tools.one_line_profile: Predicts insertion sites of transposable elements
tools.detailed_description: Jitterbug is a bioinformatic tool that predicts insertion sites of transposable elements in a sample sequenced by short paired-end reads with respect to an assembled reference.

tools.name: ARGfams
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of antibiotic resistance genes from genomes
tools.detailed_description: ARGfams is a tool and database for the fast and robust identification of antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) from microbial genomes and metagenome assemblies using HMM profiles.

tools.name: MGEfams
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of mobile genetic elements from genomes
tools.detailed_description: MGEfams is a tool and database for the fast and robust identification of mobile genetic elements (MGE) genes from genomes and metagenome assemblies.

tools.name: Argonaut
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for genome assembly accepting long and short reads
tools.detailed_description: Argonaut is a pipeline for genome assembly that accepts ONT and/or PacBio HiFi long reads as well as Illumina short reads.

tools.name: CirculoCov
tools.one_line_profile: Estimates coverage of reads on a draft assembly
tools.detailed_description: CirculoCov estimates the coverage of nanopore or illumina reads on a draft assembly, useful for assessing assembly quality.

tools.name: BRIGAD3
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization of bacterial genome assemblies from nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: BRIGAD3 is a D3 and Vue component for the visualization of bacterial genome assemblies derived from nanopore sequence data.

tools.name: DBG_assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembler for second-generation sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: DBG_assembly is developed for assembling genomes with second-generation sequencing data, specifically Illumina short reads, comparable to SOAPdenovo.

tools.name: EndHiC
tools.one_line_profile: Hi-C scaffolding tool using contig end regions
tools.detailed_description: EndHic is a fast Hi-C scaffolding tool that uses Hi-C links from contig end regions to assemble large contigs into chromosomal-level scaffolds.

tools.name: SALA
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript Start-site Aware Long-read Assembler
tools.detailed_description: SALA is a de novo assembler for long reads into transcript and gene models, incorporating support from confident transcription start sites.

tools.name: Bactflow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for whole genome assembly of ONT data
tools.detailed_description: Bactflow is a workflow containing a set of tools for whole genome assembly and visualization of Oxford Nanopore Technology sequencing reads.

tools.name: strainFlye
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing rare mutations in metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: strainFlye is a pipeline for analyzing rare mutations and strain-level variation in metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: CARE
tools.one_line_profile: Context-Aware Read Error correction for Illumina reads
tools.detailed_description: CARE is a tool for Context-Aware Read Error correction specifically designed for Illumina sequencing reads.

tools.name: MpGAP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-platform genome assembly pipeline for Illumina, Nanopore and PacBio reads
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive genome assembly pipeline designed to handle data from multiple sequencing platforms including Illumina, Nanopore, and PacBio, facilitating hybrid assembly strategies.

tools.name: GALA
tools.one_line_profile: Long-reads Gap-free Chromosome-scale Assembler
tools.detailed_description: A chromosome-scale assembly tool designed for long-read sequencing data, aiming to produce gap-free assemblies through a multi-step process involving graph-based methods.

tools.name: NanoDJ
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive Jupyter Notebook environment for Nanopore sequence manipulation and assembly
tools.detailed_description: A Dockerized Jupyter Notebook environment pre-configured with tools for interactive manipulation, quality control, and assembly of Oxford Nanopore MinION sequencing data.

tools.name: Gfapy
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible software library for handling sequence graphs (GFA) in Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for reading, writing, and manipulating sequence graphs in the Graphical Fragment Assembly (GFA) format, supporting GFA1 and GFA2 standards.

tools.name: DeepPolisher
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based sequence correction method for genome assembly polishing
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool utilizing Transformer architectures to correct errors in genome assemblies, specifically designed to polish sequences and improve consensus quality.

tools.name: Chromosomer
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-assisted assembly tool for producing draft chromosome sequences
tools.detailed_description: A tool that automates the process of assembling draft chromosome sequences from fragmented assemblies using a reference genome as a guide.

tools.name: TranscriptomeAssemblyTools
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of scripts for improving and evaluating de novo transcriptome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A suite of utilities for processing FASTQ files and analyzing de novo transcriptome assemblies to enhance quality and assess performance.

tools.name: Cornetto
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive genome assembly using nanopore sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A genome assembly tool tailored for Nanopore sequencing data, employing adaptive strategies to handle the specific error profiles of long reads.

tools.name: FMLRC
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read error correction tool using the multi-string Burrows Wheeler Transform
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance error correction tool for long reads (e.g., PacBio, Nanopore) that leverages the FM-index of the short-read sequencing data (MSBWT) to correct errors.

tools.name: GSAT
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based Sequence Assembly Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit providing graph-based methods for sequence assembly tasks, facilitating the manipulation and analysis of assembly graphs.

tools.name: HAPO-G
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly polishing tool using accurate reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to improve the quality of genome assemblies (polishing) by utilizing accurate short reads to correct errors in the consensus sequence.

tools.name: Racon
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly of long uncorrected reads, often used as a polishing step in assembly pipelines.

tools.name: ectools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for error correction and working with long read data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools designed for the error correction of long-read sequencing data (e.g., PacBio) and related assembly tasks.

tools.name: Strainy
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based assembly phasing tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for phasing metagenomic assemblies using assembly graphs, enabling the resolution of strain-level variations.

tools.name: hifiasm2txt
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for hifiasm binary output to text format
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool designed to convert binary output files from the hifiasm assembler into human-readable text format, facilitating downstream analysis and debugging of assembly graphs.

tools.name: CONSENT
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable long read self-correction and assembly polishing
tools.detailed_description: A tool for error correction of long reads (PacBio/ONT) and assembly polishing. It uses a multiple sequence alignment strategy based on partial order graphs to improve sequence quality.

tools.name: HG-CoLoR
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid error correction for long reads using variable-order de Bruijn graphs
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid method for correcting long reads using short reads. It employs a variable-order de Bruijn graph approach to align short reads to long reads for accurate error correction.

tools.name: Rcorrector
tools.one_line_profile: K-mer based error correction for Illumina RNA-seq reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed specifically for correcting errors in Illumina RNA-seq reads. It uses a De Bruijn graph to identify and correct sequencing errors, which is crucial for accurate de novo transcriptome assembly.

tools.name: Fast-Plast
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for de novo assembly of chloroplast genomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to assemble whole chloroplast genomes from whole genome sequencing data. It automates the process of cleaning, assembling, and scaffolding plastid genomes.

tools.name: MAGpy
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for annotating metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Snakemake for the downstream analysis and annotation of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs), integrating various tools for functional and taxonomic characterization.

tools.name: medaka
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network-based sequence correction and polishing for Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create consensus sequences and variant calls from nanopore sequencing data. It uses neural networks to perform sequence correction and is the standard polishing tool provided by Oxford Nanopore Technologies.

tools.name: messer
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for post-assembly small plasmid recovery and size correction
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed to recover small plasmids that might be missed or misassembled in standard nanopore assembly pipelines, and to correct their sizes.

tools.name: stylo
tools.one_line_profile: Nanopore assembly workflow from basecalling to polishing
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for processing Nanopore data, covering basecalling, assembly, polishing, QC metrics, and plasmid replicon detection.

tools.name: nf-core/bacass
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for simple bacterial assembly and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline for the assembly and annotation of bacterial genomes. It automates the use of tools like Unicycler, Prokka, and QUAST.

tools.name: nf-core/denovotranscript
tools.one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembly pipeline for RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline for de novo assembly of transcriptomes from paired-end RNA-seq data, utilizing tools like Trinity or SPAdes and performing quality assessment.

tools.name: nf-core/funcscan
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for screening functional and natural product gene sequences
tools.detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline designed to screen genomic or metagenomic assemblies for functional genes and biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) using various detection tools.

tools.name: nf-core/genomeassembler
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly of haploid genomes from long reads
tools.detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline for assembling and scaffolding haploid or unphased genomes using long-read sequencing data (ONT or PacBio HiFi).

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly, binning, and annotation of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive nf-core pipeline for metagenome analysis, including assembly (SPAdes, Megahit), binning (MetaBAT2, MaxBin2), and quality assessment of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: nf-core/viralrecon
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral assembly and variant calling
tools.detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline for the analysis of viral sequencing data, performing de novo assembly, alignment, and variant calling, particularly optimized for SARS-CoV-2 and other viral pathogens.

tools.name: SPADE
tools.one_line_profile: Spanning Tree Progression of Density Normalized Events for flow cytometry
tools.detailed_description: A visualization and analysis tool for high-dimensional flow cytometry data. It organizes cellular data into a hierarchy of related phenotypes using a spanning tree structure.

tools.name: SSPACE Basic
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffolding of pre-assembled contigs using paired-read data
tools.detailed_description: A stand-alone scaffolder of pre-assembled contigs using paired-read data. It extends contigs and connects them into scaffolds based on distance information from paired reads.

tools.name: isovar
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly of RNA reads to determine cancer mutation effects
tools.detailed_description: A tool for assembling RNA-seq reads around somatic mutation sites to determine the exact protein sequence variant expressed by a cancer mutation, aiding in neoantigen prediction.

tools.name: metagenome_assembly_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenome assembly and binning
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline developed by the Parfrey Lab to process raw sequencing data into high-quality metagenomic bins and generate visualizations.

tools.name: maf2sam
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from MIRA Assembly Format to SAM format
tools.detailed_description: A utility script to convert the MIRA Assembly Format (MAF) generated by the MIRA assembler into the standard Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) format.

tools.name: nanogo
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive bioinformatics pipeline for Oxford Nanopore Technologies
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing ONT data, including Dorado-based basecalling, amplicon read assembly, polishing, primer trimming, and quality control.

tools.name: phasebook
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype-aware de novo assembly of diploid genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for de novo assembly of diploid genomes from long reads (PacBio/ONT), specifically designed to be haplotype-aware and resolve phases during assembly.

tools.name: FALCON-Phase
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of PacBio assemblies with Hi-C data for phasing
tools.detailed_description: A tool that integrates PacBio long-read assemblies with Hi-C chromatin interaction data to create phased, diploid, chromosome-scale scaffolds.

tools.name: AGC (Assembled Genomes Compressor)
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance compressor for assembled genome collections
tools.detailed_description: AGC is a tool designed to compress collections of assembled genomes. It offers significantly better compression ratios than general-purpose compressors by exploiting similarities between genomes in the collection.

tools.name: Aviary
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly and MAG recovery pipeline for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: Aviary is a metagenomics pipeline that performs hybrid assembly (using both short and long reads), binning to recover Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs), and annotation.

tools.name: hash10x
tools.one_line_profile: Toolset for analysis and assembly of 10X Genomics linked reads
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools for processing and analyzing 10X Genomics linked read data, specifically designed to aid in de novo assembly tasks.

tools.name: Nanopore Assembly Assessment
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for evaluating Nanopore assembly and polishing performance
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based automation tool for running and assessing various assembly and polishing pipelines for Nanopore data, including performance evaluation and visualization.

tools.name: Rotary
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and annotation workflow for circular DNA from Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A workflow designed for the assembly and annotation of microbial genomes containing circular DNA elements (like plasmids) using Nanopore long reads.

tools.name: Dragonflye
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: Dragonflye is a pipeline built on top of Flye, specifically tailored for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Oxford Nanopore reads, handling polishing and other processing steps.

tools.name: Bandage
tools.one_line_profile: Visualizer for de novo assembly graphs (GFA)
tools.detailed_description: Bandage is a GUI program that allows users to interact with the assembly graphs made by de novo assemblers such as Velvet, SPAdes, MEGAHIT and others. It visualizes the graph topology and allows for exploration of nodes and connections.

tools.name: Minipolish
tools.one_line_profile: Polishing tool for miniasm assemblies using Racon
tools.detailed_description: Minipolish is a wrapper script that bridges the gap between the miniasm assembler and the Racon polisher, automating the polishing process for long-read assemblies.

tools.name: Polypolish
tools.one_line_profile: Short-read polisher for long-read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: Polypolish uses short reads (Illumina) to fix errors in long-read assemblies (Nanopore/PacBio). It is specifically designed to correct errors in repeat regions that other polishers might miss.

tools.name: Unicycler
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly pipeline for bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: Unicycler is a genome assembler specifically designed for bacterial genomes. It functions as a hybrid assembler (using both short and long reads) or as a long-read only assembler, aiming to produce complete, circularized genomes.

tools.name: SMARTdenovo
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast de novo assembler for long noisy reads
tools.detailed_description: SMARTdenovo is a de novo assembler designed for long noisy reads (PacBio/Nanopore). It does not require error correction prior to assembly and is optimized for speed.

tools.name: wtdbg2 (Redbean)
tools.one_line_profile: Fuzzy Bruijn graph assembler for long noisy reads
tools.detailed_description: wtdbg2 (also known as Redbean) is a de novo sequence assembler for long noisy reads. It uses a fuzzy Bruijn graph approach which makes it extremely fast and memory efficient compared to OLC-based assemblers.

tools.name: Rala
tools.one_line_profile: Layout module for raw de novo genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: Rala is a standalone layout module intended for the assembly of raw, uncorrected long reads. It is often used in conjunction with other modular assembly tools like Racon and Raven.

tools.name: Sanger Metagenome Assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for metagenome assembly and binning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline developed by the Sanger Institute for assembling and binning metagenomes using PacBio HiFi and Illumina Hi-C sequencing data.

tools.name: centroFlye
tools.one_line_profile: Centromere assembly algorithm using long error-prone reads
tools.detailed_description: centroFlye is a specialized assembly algorithm designed to reconstruct the highly repetitive centromeric regions of genomes using long, error-prone sequencing reads.

tools.name: Mabs
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly optimizer for Hifiasm and Flye
tools.detailed_description: Mabs is a tool that automates the optimization of parameters for popular assemblers like Hifiasm and Flye to improve assembly quality.

tools.name: AssemblyByPacBio
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for PacBio SMRT read processing and barcode assignment
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts from the Shendure Lab for processing PacBio SMRT reads, specifically for assigning barcodes to variable regions, aiding in downstream assembly or analysis.

tools.name: B.NanoAmP
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial Nanopore Assembly Pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the assembly of bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore sequencing data.

tools.name: PlasFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Plasmid sequence prediction in metagenomic assemblies
tools.detailed_description: PlasFlow is a tool for predicting plasmid sequences within metagenomic assemblies using neural networks, helping to distinguish plasmids from chromosomal DNA.

tools.name: MAGpurify
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for cleaning and improving metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: MAGpurify is a post-processing tool for metagenomic assemblies. It identifies and removes contaminant contigs from Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) to improve their quality.

tools.name: Stitch
tools.one_line_profile: Template-based assembly of proteomics short reads
tools.detailed_description: Stitch is a tool for the de novo assembly of antibody sequences and repertoire profiling using proteomics short read data. It applies assembly principles to protein sequencing.

tools.name: assemblage
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for working with genome assemblies and sequences
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Perl scripts and tools for processing, analyzing, and manipulating second-generation genome assemblies and FASTA sequences.

tools.name: ALGA
tools.one_line_profile: Short read de novo genome assembler
tools.detailed_description: ALGA is a de novo genome assembler designed for short read sequencing data.

tools.name: HiMT
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for assembling plant mitochondrial genomes using HiFi reads
tools.detailed_description: HiMT is an integrative toolkit specifically designed for the assembly of complex plant mitochondrial genomes using PacBio HiFi reads.

tools.name: SPADEVizR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualization and analysis of SPADE cytometry results
tools.detailed_description: SPADEVizR is an R package designed to visualize, analyze, and integrate results from SPADE (Spanning-tree Progression Analysis of Density-normalized Events), a clustering algorithm used in flow cytometry and mass cytometry.

tools.name: transXpress
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for de novo transcriptome assembly and annotation
tools.detailed_description: transXpress is a Snakemake pipeline designed to streamline the process of de novo transcriptome assembly and annotation, facilitating reproducible analysis of RNA-Seq data.

tools.name: Trinity
tools.one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembler for RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: Trinity represents a novel method for the efficient and robust de novo reconstruction of transcriptomes from RNA-Seq data. It partitions the sequence data into many individual de Bruijn graphs, each representing the transcriptional complexity at a given gene or locus.

tools.name: mokka
tools.one_line_profile: Automated annotation tool for metagenome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: Mokka is a tool designed to annotate metagenome assemblies, likely wrapping other annotation tools to provide a streamlined process for characterizing metagenomic contigs.

tools.name: polyfix
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to repair nanopore assemblies using related genomes
tools.detailed_description: Polyfix is a utility for polishing and repairing Nanopore-based genome assemblies by leveraging information from related reference genomes to correct errors.

tools.name: shovill
tools.one_line_profile: Faster SPAdes assembler wrapper for bacterial isolate genomes
tools.detailed_description: Shovill is a pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Illumina paired-end reads. It uses SPAdes at its core but alters the steps before and after assembly to improve speed and consistency.

tools.name: autopore
tools.one_line_profile: CWL workflows for nanopore de novo assembly
tools.detailed_description: Autopore is a suite of Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows designed to automate the de novo assembly of genomes using Oxford Nanopore sequencing data.

tools.name: teloscope
tools.one_line_profile: Telomere annotation tool for genome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: Teloscope is a comprehensive tool for annotating telomeres in genome assemblies and graphs, aiding in the structural analysis of chromosome ends.

tools.name: HapCUT2
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype assembly and phasing tool
tools.detailed_description: HapCUT2 is a tool for haplotype assembly from sequencing data. It is designed to phase variants and assemble haplotypes with high accuracy using reads from various sequencing technologies.

tools.name: Metaphor
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for assembly and binning of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: Metaphor is a general-purpose automated workflow for the assembly and binning of metagenomic data, integrating multiple tools to produce metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: MEGAHIT
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast and memory-efficient metagenome assembler
tools.detailed_description: MEGAHIT is a single-node assembler for large and complex metagenomics NGS reads. It makes use of succinct de Bruijn graphs (SdBG) to achieve low memory usage and high speed.

tools.name: HASLR
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid assembler for long and short reads
tools.detailed_description: HASLR is a fast and memory-efficient tool for hybrid genome assembly that utilizes both long reads (e.g., PacBio, Nanopore) and short reads (Illumina) to produce high-quality assemblies.

tools.name: OM-HiC-scaffolding
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffolding workflows using optical mapping and Hi-C data
tools.detailed_description: This repository provides workflows for correcting and scaffolding long-read genome assemblies (PacBio, Nanopore) by integrating Optical Mapping and/or Dovetail Hi-C data.

tools.name: Spriggan
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for bacterial assembly and AMR gene identification
tools.detailed_description: Spriggan is a bioinformatics pipeline developed for the assembly of bacterial whole genome sequence data and the subsequent identification of antibiotic resistance genes.

tools.name: galah
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable dereplication tool for metagenome assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: Galah is a tool designed for the scalable dereplication of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), helping to cluster and select representative genomes from large datasets.

tools.name: RAGA
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-Assisted Genome Assembly tool
tools.detailed_description: RAGA (Reference-Assisted Genome Assembly) is a tool that generates alternative long reads by leveraging target assemblies, PacBio HiFi reads, and a reference genome to improve assembly outcomes.

tools.name: MECAT
tools.one_line_profile: Fast mapping, error correction and assembly for single-molecule reads
tools.detailed_description: MECAT is an ultra-fast mapping, error correction, and de novo assembly tool designed specifically for single-molecule sequencing reads (e.g., PacBio, Nanopore).

tools.name: Ig Repertoire Constructor
tools.one_line_profile: Error-correction and assembly for immunosequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Ig Repertoire Constructor is an algorithm for the error-correction of immunosequencing Illumina MiSeq reads and performs immunoproteogenomic analysis, specifically for antibody repertoire assembly.

tools.name: DBG2OLC
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid genome assembler using long and short reads
tools.detailed_description: DBG2OLC is a genome assembler that efficiently combines long, erroneous third-generation sequencing reads with short, accurate NGS reads to produce high-quality assemblies with reduced computational cost.

tools.name: HapHiC
tools.one_line_profile: Allele-aware scaffolding tool based on Hi-C data
tools.detailed_description: HapHiC is a fast, reference-independent, and allele-aware scaffolding tool that utilizes Hi-C data to scaffold contigs into chromosome-scale assemblies, particularly useful for polyploid or heterozygous genomes.

tools.name: EToKi
tools.one_line_profile: Enterobase Tool Kit for bacterial genomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: EToKi (Enterobase Tool Kit) contains the standalone implementation of the pipelines and methods used by Enterobase for the assembly, analysis, and typing of bacterial genomes.
